The Ultimate Dance Off!

Hey, Classy Ladies and Macho Men...

Select your favorite dancer from the menu. Then click the "Boogie On!" button continously to make your dancer impress the television audience who are voting. After 10 seconds, the voting is closed and our winner is announced.

You'll be pitted against some strong challengers. So loosen your top, get the hair perfect, and put those dancing shoes on. Good luck, twinkle toes!
